titleStmt.title: An amicable accommodation of the difference between the representer and the answerer in return to his last reply against the papist protesting against Protestant popery.
titleStmt.author: Gother, John, d. 1704.

notesStmt.note: Defence of Gother's "A papist misrepresented and represented" and his "Papists protesting against Protestant-popery" and reply to William Sherlock's "An answer to a discourse, intituled, Papists protesting against Protestant-popery.
Attributed to John Gother. Halkett & Laing (2nd ed.).
Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
